Welcome to Our Restaurant Management System

Your one-stop solution for managing your restaurant efficiently.

Features

Track Orders in Real-Time Manage Reservations Update and Customize Menu Items

Get Started

Check out the Reservations to see upcoming bookings.

 ); } export default Home;
